title: Smaller and Smaller
description: A group of farm animals notice that their friends appear smaller and smaller as they go to a barn far away. Cow, who believes that each animal has disappeared, is the last to go to the barn. When she gets to the barn, she discovers something unexpected.
meta: bigger, disappeared, farther, goodness, reached, shrinking
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand and remember a fiction story
Sequence Events : Sequence events in a story
Manipulate Medial Sounds : Manipulate medial sounds
Quotation Marks : Recognize and understand the use of quotation marks

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
